pages.title: Blood Poppy
pages.text: A Blood Rose has an appearance very similar to a normal $(item)Poppy$(), but holds a secret. With its sharp spikes, it can scrath those who pass over it. The Rose will collect a blood sample of the creature and store it. The sample can be collected with the use of a $(l:artifacts/misc/taglock_kit)Taglock Kit$(/l). The Rose will lose the sample if harvested with anything except a $(l:artifacts/tools/boline)Boline$(/l).
